short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Uncover hidden deals on Priceline and Hotwire. Buy with confidence knowing exactly what hotel you are booking.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We remove the mystery component of the "Express Deals" on Priceline and the ‚ÄúHot Rate‚Äù on Hotwire. What is left is a great hotel deal you can now buy with confidence. Upgrade your hotel stay while saving more!

FEATURES

üõå PRICELINE HIDDEN HOTEL NAME REVEAL 
Priceline has unique ‚ÄòExpress Deals‚Äô that offer up to 60% discounts on 5-star hotels.
The problem is that the name of the hotel is only shared with you after you pay and this is a non-refundable deal.
Thanks to our extension, you can book the hotel with confidence as we predict the ‚Äúmystery deal‚Äù hotel name with 99% accuracy.


üõå HOTWIRE HIDDEN HOTEL NAME REVEAL
Hotwire has unique ‚ÄòHot rate‚Äù deals that offer up to 60% off discounts on 5-star hotels. The catch is that the name of the hotel is not revealed until after you pay and this is also a non-refundable deal.
Thanks to our extension, you can book the hotel with confidence as we predict the ‚Äúmystery deal‚Äù hotel name with 99% accuracy.

Use the Pricewire extension to upgrade your travel lifestyle with fantastic hotel deals. Book with confidence and use the money saved to book extra hotel days, get show tickets, or enjoy delicious meals in local restaurants!
